description: Ramireddy Subbarami Reddy Engineering College AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.

Library: The library has a huge stock of text books, reference books, journals and periodicals along with magazines and newspapers. There are 12493 volumes and 2480 titles available in the library. E-Books, E-journals and CD ROMS are also available for the students.

Hostel: Separate hostel facility is provided for both boys and girls on the campus. Girls’ hostel is in a 3 storeyed building with 44 rooms to accommodate 264 students while Boys hostel is in a 4 storeyed building.
NSS: NSS unit is very active in the college campus. Various activities are organized by the volunteers such as Blood donation camps, AIDS awareness camps, Social awareness programs etc.

Co-curricular and extra-curricular activities: Extracurricular activities are regularly conducted in the college campus for their all-round development. The college conducts competitions in cultural events. Student clubs are quite active in promoting extracurricular activities.

Section.name: About RSREC
Section.description:
Ramireddy Subbarami Reddy Engineering College, Kadanutala, was started in 2008 under umbrella of Ramireddy Subbaramireddy Educational Trust. The motto of the college is to provide quality technical education and encourage the process of research and development in engineering education. The college is approved by AICTE and is affiliated to JNTU, Anantpur.
Ramireddy Subbarami Reddy Engineering College AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
Library: The library has a huge stock of text books, reference books, journals and periodicals along with magazines and newspapers. There are 12493 volumes and 2480 titles available in the library. E-Books, E-journals and CD ROMS are also available for the students.
Hostel: Separate hostel facility is provided for both boys and girls on the campus. Girls’ hostel is in a 3 storeyed building with 44 rooms to accommodate 264 students while Boys hostel is in a 4 storeyed building.
NSS: NSS unit is very active in the college campus. Various activities are organized by the volunteers such as Blood donation camps, AIDS awareness camps, Social awareness programs etc.
Co-curricular and extra-curricular activities: Extracurricular activities are regularly conducted in the college campus for their all-round development. The college conducts competitions in cultural events. Student clubs are quite active in promoting extracurricular activities.
